project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A portal that enables self-service onboarding, centralized knowledge management, and usage data visualization for customers.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Users can log in to the COSP using their SaaS product credentials
No additional login credentials required for the COSP

feature_breakdown.description: Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Onboarding checklist is displayed based on the customer's subscription tier
Checklist items are tailored to the customer's specific needs

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to enable seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search and view all available product documentation
Knowledge base content is displayed within the COSP

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics, such as daily active users and feature usage.
technical_requirements: Data integration from main SaaS product
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays key adoption metrics for the customer
Metrics are updated in real-time or near real-time

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Users can easily contact their CSM from the COSP
Customer details are automatically included in the email or ticket

technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests are routed through the API Gateway, which then communicates with the necessary microservices to fetch and process data. Microservices interact with the database, message queue, and caching layer as needed. Responses are then returned to the web application.
security_considerations: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) for user permissions
Use industry-standard encryption (TLS 1.2+) for all communication
Regularly audit and update security measures to comply with ISO 27001

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the minimum viable product (MVP) with core onboarding and self-service features.
Implement the adoption metrics dashboard and integrate with the main SaaS product.
deliverables: Real-time data synchronization with main SaaS product

implementation_phases.description: Enhance the COSP with the 'Contact CSM' feature to improve customer support efficiency.

risk_analysis.description: Delayed integration with the existing knowledge base API
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with the knowledge base team early, establish clear communication and collaboration protocols, and allocate additional resources if needed.

risk_analysis.description: Difficulty in designing a scalable and performant architecture
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct thorough capacity planning, stress testing, and load testing during the design phase. Implement a modular and cloud-native architecture to ensure scalability.

risk_analysis.description: Lack of user adoption due to poor user experience
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct user research, usability testing, and iterative design to ensure the COSP meets user needs. Gather feedback and continuously improve the user experience.

infrastructure_needs: Managed message queue and caching services

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze customer retention data from the CRM system

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track the time between customer onboarding and first feature adoption

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor CSM workload and time spent on various tasks

success_metrics.target_value: Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze support ticket data and user activity within the COSP
